text: "The slightly less skilled one from SHHis is still around~"

I wonder if both of them
are also checking social media posts...──
...And here we have magazine critiques, huh────

"Aketa who is a polished dancer, created the space
and the moment for Nanakusa to throw a single note" ...huh
Is this also an achievement of sorts...?

Aketa-san, your attention to detail
is impeccable today too. You did really well!

Although you're improving,
you still know there's a long way to go, right?

Yeah,
if you know that, then you'll surely continue to grow.

────Alright, let's start over again!
Nanakusa-san, let's focus more on dancing accurately!

What did we gain from this live performance...?
What did Nichika and Mikoto value...?

We have to keep connecting...
Next time, we'll definitely achieve results────
